ComicInfo.Title: The Mirror War [Part 5]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Mirror War [Part 5]: Picard has made use of the Faundori to build a new fleet of starships for the Empire, which draws the attention of Worf and the Klingons. Picard appeals to Admiral Nechayev for the resources to power the new fleet, but Nechayev challenges Picard to find the resources on his own, or she will take control of the fleet from Picard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:45:11. [CVDB914657] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:00:28. [Issue ID 2384943]
